revision.text:
void '''SetFogDensity''' (int ''tag'', int ''density'') {{Gzdoomfeature}} == Usage == Sets the density of the fog of the tagged [[sector]]. This overrides the default calculation from the light level.
=== Parameters === * ''tag'': the [[tag]] of the sector whose fog density is to be set. * ''density'': the density amount of the fog. The higher this value is the more dense the fog is. This ranges from 0 to 510.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[category:ACS Level alteration functions]]
